channel.title: Adventure Items
channel.description: Find a D&D adventure to give your character the perfect piece of swag.

item.title: CCC-BMG MOON12-1 - Nothing Is Sacred
item.content:encoded:
Nothing Is Sacred

Convention Created Content for Tier 3 Released by Baldman Games on May 19, 2021

The Moonshaes are plunged into shadow and with permission of High Lady Ordalf, survivors have made their way to Gwynneth, the only Isle spared from darkness. The Conclave needs heroes to execute their plans of survival in the face of the most powerful threat the Moonshaes have yet seen, the Slain.

Part One of the Pawns of Torment series.

item.title: CCC-BMG MOON12-2 - A Gift from the Queen
item.content:encoded:
A Gift from the Queen

Convention Created Content for Tier 3 Released by Baldman Games on May 19, 2021

With the fate of the Moonshaes held in the balance, the adventurer’s path lies in the lost tomb of an ancient Queen. What answers could she possibly offer to loosen the Slain’s deadly hold on this world.

Part Two of the Pawns of Torment series.

item.title: CCC-BMG MOON12-3 - Tempest of Malice
item.content:encoded:
Tempest of Malice

Convention Created Content for Tier 3 Released by Baldman Games on May 19, 2021

The key to severing the chains of the Slain is located at Tempest Keep, and the adventurers must face the impossible—brave the wrath of the elements to harness the power of the storm.

Part Three of the Pawns of Torment series.

item.title: CCC-BMG MOON11-1 - A Darkened City
item.content:encoded:
A Darkened City

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released by Baldman Games on May 12, 2021

Once brilliant Caer Callidyrr has darkened, and the Slain sits on the High King’s throne. Helpless to fight this unknowable enemy, the forces of light have asked you to infiltrate the enemy’s stronghold and learn all you can. Will you dare the shadowed streets of the capital of the Moonshaes to gain entry to the Court of the Slain?

Part One of the Somber Remnant series.

item.title: CCC-BMG MOON11-2 - A Darkened Court
item.content:encoded:
A Darkened Court

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released by Baldman Games on May 12, 2021

The Court of the Slain at Caer Callidyrr holds many intrigues and even more danger. Yet you must walk these darkened halls and speak in whispers to uncover the malevolent plots of the Slain. Careful, now. One wrong step or a misplaced word could mean exposure and oblivion.

Part Two of the Somber Remnant series.

item.title: CCC-BMG MOON11-3 - A Darkened Heart
item.content:encoded:
A Darkened Heart

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released by Baldman Games on May 12, 2021

You have worked your way to the heart of the Darkened Court at Caer Callidyrr. There, you have a chance to pierce the shadows and secrets that surround and protect the Slain. Can you reveal the mystery of the greatest threat to the Moonshaes and will you survive to tell anyone else?

Part Three of the Somber Remnant series.

item.title: CCC-BMG MOON10-1 - Whispers & Warnings
item.content:encoded:
Whispers & Warnings

Convention Created Content for Tier 1 Released by Baldman Games on May 9, 2021

The reach of the Shadowfell has come to Alaron! The Great Gark’s forces are intent on spreading the Howling Disease throughout the island, and the fey are in dire peril. Will you ride to their aid or will the shadow spread across the land?

Part One of the Dark Tidings series.

item.title: CCC-BMG MOON10-2 - Shadows & Shrouds
item.content:encoded:
Shadows & Shrouds

Convention Created Content for Tier 1 Released by Baldman Games on May 9, 2021

A new threat is gaining power over the moonwells of Alaron, and the druids of the Earthmother believe the best way to uncover the sinister plot is to venture into the Shadowfell itself.

Part Two of the Dark Tidings series.

item.title: CCC-BMG MOON10-3 - Fortresses & Fortunes
item.content:encoded:
Fortresses & Fortunes

Convention Created Content for Tier 1 Released by Baldman Games on May 9, 2021

A mysterious force from the Shadowfell threatens the high seat of power in Alaron! With an army marching to the capital and enemies within Caer Callidyrr, the royal family places their trust in outsiders to root out the evil within before the enemies overwhelm the last free human kingdom of the Moonshaes!

Part Three of the Dark Tidings series.

item.title: DDAL-EB-16 - The Dragon Below
item.description: Dryyn’s Tentacle Whip, Living Armor, Living Gloves, 3 legacy events, and 2 other items
item.content:encoded:
The Dragon Below

Oracle of War Adventure for Tier 3 Released on May 2, 2021

In the depths of Valaara’s sanctuary, the Order of the Emerald Claw harnesses ancient engines of destruction to wage war on the surface world. Only the Oracle of War can stop them now—if the adventurers can get it to work! This is the third in a trilogy of adventures, the Engines of War storyline.

Items

  • Dryyn’s Tentacle Whip Very Rare
  • Living Armor Very Rare
  • Living Gloves Uncommon
  • 2 x Oil of Etherealness Rare

Legacy Events

Madness Unleashed

You freed Valaara, “the Crawing Queen” from the Deepest Hive, her demiplane lair in the depths of Khyber. Spinweave told you Valaara would only briefly be freed, and Spinweave wouldn’t lie to you. Besides, what’s unleashing one of the daelkyr between friends, really?

Making Trouble

Trez Zul revealed that the Lord of Blades is searching the ruins of Making for a creation forged hidden inside a secret Cyran government facility. The Lord of Blades is capturing and interrogating Cyran officers to uncover the location of this base.

Secret of the Triune

You gave the three genies bound within the Oracle of War a secret. What will come of this fledgling bond of trust between you and the Lamannian Triune?

item.title: DDAL10-08 - Volatile Thoughts
item.description: Boots of Levitation
item.content:encoded:
Volatile Thoughts

Season 10 Adventure for Tier 2 Released on April 15, 2021

Just when you thought Realmspace-faring slavers were the worst thing that could cross your path, it quickly became apparent you were wrong—terrible things lurk in the depths of the longdead Abeiran city of Xorvintroth. And when faced with countless, unfathomable horrors infesting an ancient city of a long-dead civilization from another world there’s only one solution…explosives.

Part Eight of the Plague of Ancients series.

Items

  • Boots of Levitation Rare

item.title: DDAL-EB-15 - Dream Eater
item.description: Bracers of Archery, Staff of the Woodlands, and 3 legacy events
item.content:encoded:
Dream Eater

Oracle of War Adventure for Tier 3 Released on April 5, 2021

Across Eberron, the spirits of the dead stir as the Order of the Emerald Claw draws back the veil to Dolurrh. To avert calamity, the adventurers must cut a deal with an infamous bonecaster of the Talenta Plains—the Dream Eater—and her pack of loyal tyrannosaurs. This is the second in a trilogy of adventures, the Engines of War storyline.

Items

  • Bracers of Archery Uncommon
  • Staff of the Woodlands Rare

Legacy Events

Allosaurus Mount Pet
Dragon Spirit

In the mists of the Boneyard, you allowed the restless spirit of a silver dragon to latch onto your soul. While the dragon spirit dwells inside you, you are immune to the Frightful Presence of dragons and have resistance to damage from their breath weapons.

Dream Walker

You helped the Dream Eater lay the restless spirit of hte dragon Carnelian to rest. At the end of the adventure, choose one of the following rewards:

  • The Dream Eater performs a ritual that grants you resistance to necrotic damage for the duration of your next adventure.
  • If you chose the allosaurus mount as a reward, the halfling Norrin teaches it the “Talenta Dodge”. If the allosaurus is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails. (Norrin must survive the adventure to offer this training.)
  • If you chose the bracers of archery reward, the halfling Davric enchants your quiver with a luck charm. When you roll a 1 on a d20 for an attack roll with an arrow drawn from this quiver, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll. (Davric must survive the adventure to offer this reward.)

item.title: DC-PoA-PM05 - Can You Tell Me How to Get to the East Haven Way
item.description: Moon-Touched Shortsword and a potion
item.content:encoded:
Can You Tell Me How to Get to the East Haven Way

Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 1 Released on March 30, 2021

Adventure Seed: Do You Know the way to Lonelywood?

While entering Good Mead, the party gets involved with a caravan merchant and a local brewer involving a missing shipment of Mead to Easthaven. Will the party be able to find out what happened to this shipment or will the people of Easthaven become angry due to the missing shipment?!

Items

  • Moon-Touched Shortsword Common
  • 1 x Potion of Healing Common

item.title: DC-PoA-GaryXIII-04 - As Above, So Below
item.description: Cast-Off Armor (Breastplate), Guardian Emblem, and a scroll
item.content:encoded:
As Above, So Below

Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 2 Released on March 25, 2021

Adventure Seed: Holy Auril, Mother of Cod

A lottery held under suspicous circumstances. A Paladin trying to do the right thing. Can the adventurers find the truth in time?

Part Four of the To Survive the Night series.

Items

  • Cast-Off Armor (Breastplate) Common
  • Guardian Emblem Uncommon
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Detect Evil and Good Common

item.title: DC-PoA-GaryXIII-05 - Shard of Hope
item.description: Arcane Grimoire, +1, Illuminator’s Tattoo, and a potion
item.content:encoded:
Shard of Hope

Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 2 Released on March 25, 2021

Adventure Seed: This Seems Familiar

When arcane experimentation creates artifacts that ensnare the mind and beguile the senses, only the bravest adventurers can resist the toxic temptation of desecration and darkness, to travel to where this evil lies and defeat it. Lies are brought to bear and secrets are revealed.

Part Five of the To Survive the Night series.

Items

  • Arcane Grimoire, +1 Uncommon
  • Illuminator’s Tattoo Common
  • 1 x Potion of Healing Common

item.title: DC-PoA-GaryXIII-01 - Little Feet, Cold Nights
item.description: All-Purpose Tool, +1, Boots of False Tracks, and a scroll
item.content:encoded:
Little Feet, Cold Nights

Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 2 Released on March 24, 2021

Adventure Seed: My, What Big Feet You Have

Strange lights in the forest, claw marks on the doors of regular citizens, and worst of all; their beloved pets are being attacked and killed. The town of West Easthaven is under attack by unknown forces for nefarious reasons. Can our adventurers put together the clues to make sense of these strange events or will the citizens continue to be terrorized by these odd disturbances?

Part One of the To Survive the Night series.

Items

  • All-Purpose Tool, +1 Uncommon
  • Boots of False Tracks Common
  • 1 x Scroll of Protection from Evil and Good Common

item.title: DC-PoA-GaryXIII-02 - A New Place to Call Home
item.description: Mirror of the Past, Mithral Armor (scale, barding only), and 6 other items
item.content:encoded:
A New Place to Call Home

Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 2 Released on March 24, 2021

Adventure Seed: Ageless Hunger

Undead pour from an abandon keep in The Frozen North, threatening the already tenuous balance of life in the Ten-Towns, as an unlikely benefactor seeks heroes in hopes of turning this keep into a future stronghold. Secrets and dangers await the heroes as they venture out into the unforgiving cold.

Part Two of the To Survive the Night series.

Items

  • Mirror of the Past Rare
  • Mithral Armor (scale, barding only) Uncommon
  • 6 x Bone-Tipped Arrow, +1 Uncommon

item.title: DC-PoA-GaryXIII-03 - Personal Fouls and Penalties
item.description: Cloak of the Manta Ray, Wand of Pyrotechnics, and a potion
item.content:encoded:
Personal Fouls and Penalties

Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 2 Released on March 24, 2021

Adventure Seed: Goat-ball!

Morale in the small village of Goodenow has fallen to an all-time low with the suspicious death of the star goat-ball player on the eve of a big match. When a shadowy enemy begins to target a local team of bonesetters, the mystery deepens. Is it game over in Goodenow?

Part Three of the To Survive the Night series.

Items

  • Cloak of the Manta Ray Uncommon
  • Wand of Pyrotechnics Common
  • 1 x Potion of Watchful Rest Common

item.title: DC-PoA-DCAF09 - An Ascent to Recall
item.description: Arcane Grimoire, +1, Illuminator’s Tattoo, and a potion
item.content:encoded:
An Ascent to Recall

Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 2 Released on March 23, 2021

Adventure Seed: This Seems Familiar

A hiking trip to a romantic spot goes awry. The mountain’s yetis are just one obstacle to worry about. Will love prevail once more?

Part One of the Targos Targeted series.

Items

  • Arcane Grimoire, +1 Uncommon
  • Illuminator’s Tattoo Common
  • 1 x Potion of Healing Common

item.title: DDHC-CM-01 - The Joy of Extradimensional Spaces
item.content:encoded:
The Joy of Extradimensional Spaces

Hardcover Adventure for Tier 1 Released on March 15, 2021

A book leads characters on a quest to find a missing sage. This adventure, inspired by the Mordenkainen’s magnificent mansion spell, presents a memorable introductory mystery for new arrivals to Candlekeep.

item.title: DDHC-CM-02 - Mazfroth’s Mighty Digressions
item.content:encoded:
Mazfroth’s Mighty Digressions

Hardcover Adventure for Tier 1 Released on March 15, 2021

A monstrous revelation sheds light on a book merchant’s scam. This adventure takes the characters from Candlekeep to Baldur’s Gate and includes a new monster: the gingwatzim.

item.title: DDHC-CM-03 - Book of the Raven
item.content:encoded:
Book of the Raven

Hardcover Adventure for Tier 1 Released on March 15, 2021

A treasure map tucked inside a book leads adventurers to a remote hilltop chalet occupied by a secret society. This adventure has the trappings of a haunted house mystery and provides a possible route into the Shadowfell.

item.title: DDHC-CM-04 - A Deep and Creeping Darkness
item.content:encoded:
A Deep and Creeping Darkness

Hardcover Adventure for Tier 1 Released on March 15, 2021

A book describing a mining disaster prompts adventurers to search for a missing town. This mystery keeps players guessing until the end and makes clever use of a D&D monster that rarely gets much love.

item.title: DDHC-CM-05 - Shemshime’s Bedtime Rhyme
item.content:encoded:
Shemshime’s Bedtime Rhyme

Hardcover Adventure for Tier 1 Released on March 15, 2021

A catchy and contagious rhyme traces back to a sinister clockwork book. Trapped in one of Candlekeep’s cellars, the characters must figure out the best way to stop the spread of this odd contagion.

item.title: DDHC-CM-06 - The Price of Beauty
item.content:encoded:
The Price of Beauty

Hardcover Adventure for Tier 2 Released on March 15, 2021

A book about beauty shows the way to a secluded temple where beauty is only skin deep. Characters who don’t want to get embroiled in the temple’s mysteries should, at the very least, enjoy the bath and pedicure.

item.title: DDHC-CM-07 - Book of Cylinders
item.content:encoded:
Book of Cylinders

Hardcover Adventure for Tier 2 Released on March 15, 2021

Engraved cylinders contained within a book tell a gripping tale when rolled across wet clay. This adventure updates the grippli (distant relatives to bullywugs) for fifth edition and sheds some light on grippli society.

item.title: DDHC-CM-08 - Sarah of Yellowcrest Manor
item.content:encoded:
Sarah of Yellowcrest Manor

Hardcover Adventure for Tier 2 Released on March 15, 2021

A haunted book points a ghostly finger at the perpetrators of an unsolved mass killing in Waterdeep. This mystery features urban and dungeon exploration, as well as a potentially new, otherworldly campaign villain.

item.title: DDHC-CM-09 - Lore of Lurue
item.content:encoded:
Lore of Lurue

Hardcover Adventure for Tier 2 Released on March 15, 2021

Adventurers become immersed in a storybook conflict involving Lurue the Unicorn Queen and Malar the Beast Lord, which leads adventurers to the corrupted Pool of Eternal Spring. Can they end the corruption for the good of the High Forest?

item.title: DDHC-CM-10 - Kandlekeep Dekonstruktion
item.content:encoded:
Kandlekeep Dekonstruktion

Hardcover Adventure for Tier 2 Released on March 15, 2021

A stolen book leads adventurers to a tower in Candlekeep that is more than what it seems. This adventure strikes a more light-hearted tone than the others, but the mystery and its revelations are well worth the journey.

item.title: DDHC-CM-11 - Zikran’s Zephyrean Tome
item.content:encoded:
Zikran’s Zephyrean Tome

Hardcover Adventure for Tier 2 Released on March 15, 2021

A djinni trapped in a book offers a wish spell to adventurers to find a way to release him. The key to the djinni’s freedom lies with his former master, a mad wizard on the cusp of mastering elemental magic.

item.title: DDHC-CM-12 - The Curious Tale of Wisteria Vale
item.content:encoded:
The Curious Tale of Wisteria Vale

Hardcover Adventure for Tier 3 Released on March 15, 2021

A book holds the key to freeing Arrant Quill, who has languished in a demiplanar prison for years, waiting for a cure to his madness. The adventurers must administer the cure but Quill is not the greatest danger in this prison plane.

item.title: DDHC-CM-13 - The Book of Inner Alchemy
item.content:encoded:
The Book of Inner Alchemy

Hardcover Adventure for Tier 3 Released on March 15, 2021

A search for the missing pages of a book puts adventurers in conflict with the monks of the Immortal Lotus. Heroes who defeat these Shou villains and retrieve the pages can learn to make gloves of soul catching, a new and legendary magic item.

item.title: DDHC-CM-14 - The Canopic Being
item.content:encoded:
The Canopic Being

Hardcover Adventure for Tier 3 Released on March 15, 2021

A book brings a number of puzzling organ transplants to life. This adventure takes the characters from Candlekeep to Tashluta, a tropical city, and from there into an unusual dungeon harboring a fearsome threat to their future well-being.

item.title: DDHC-CM-15 - The Scrivener’s Tale
item.content:encoded:
The Scrivener’s Tale

Hardcover Adventure for Tier 3 Released on March 15, 2021

A tome leaves its magical mark as adventurers struggle to contain the evil archfey trapped inside it. In this adventure, heroes are taken to the ruins of a forgotten kingdom and its ancient, subterranean library.

item.title: DDHC-CM-16 - Alkaaar’s Appendix
item.content:encoded:
Alkaaar’s Appendix

Hardcover Adventure for Tier 3 Released on March 15, 2021

A book chronicles an unsolved mystery about a wandering stone golem in the desert of Anauroch. The golem is part of a larger mystery that unfolds as characters explore, ending with the discovery of a necropolis buried in the sand.

item.title: DDHC-CM-17 - Xanthoria
item.content:encoded:
Xanthoria

Hardcover Adventure for Tier 4 Released on March 15, 2021

A fell grimoire helps adventurers end a fungal plague. But Xanthoria is more than just the name of the book; it’s the last word spoken by those who succumb to the plague, and adventurers who pursue the book’s leads will soon find out why.

item.title: DDAL10-07 - Into Darkness
item.description: Dark Shard Amulet and Mace of Smiting
item.content:encoded:
Into Darkness

Season 10 Adventure for Tier 2 Released on March 11, 2021

Times have been especially hard on the goliaths of Wyrmdoom Crag, and losing the few hunters they have left to neogi slavers will certainly spell their doom. You must delve into the ruins of an ancient city buried beneath the Spine of the World. What secrets lay in the deep dark? Do they promise salvation or doom?

Part Seven of the Plague of Ancients series.

Items

  • Dark Shard Amulet Common
  • Mace of Smiting Rare

item.title: DC-PoA-PM04 - Losing Your Mind
item.description: Smoldering Armor (Studded Leather) and a scroll
item.content:encoded:
Losing Your Mind

Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 1 Released on March 10, 2021

Adventure Seed: The Muttering Gnome

A mind is a terrible thing to waste. But when you lose your mind it can be even worse. The party investigates a gnome who entered into the party's camp repeating the same thing over and over again. What can do this to a person?

Items

  • Smoldering Armor (Studded Leather) Common
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Bless Common

item.title: DDAL-DRW-08 - The Harrowing of Hell
item.description: Chime of Opening, Oathbow, Scarab of Protection, 4 potions, and 3 legacy events
item.content:encoded:
The Harrowing of Hell

Dreams of Red Wizards Adventure for Tier 4 Released on March 10, 2021

King Hekaton’s soul is trapped in the Nine Hells—and the characters must brave trials on Avernus, Acheron, and in the mind of the storm giant king to win it back from the Lord of Lies. Part Six of the Storm King’s Descent series of adventures.

Items

  • Chime of Opening Rare
  • Oathbow Very Rare
  • Scarab of Protection Legendary
  • 1 x Potion of Storm Giant Strength Legendary
  • 3 x Potion of Vitality Very Rare

Legacy Events

Burn, Baby, Burn

Asmodeus has imprisoned your soul within a soul coin and fed it to an infernal war machine’s engine, destroying your soul instantly. Not even divine intervention can resurrect you now. Your character is permanently retired.

No Exceptions!

You’ve broken one of Mahadi’s rules for the Wandering Emporium: “No fighting! No spellcasting! No exceptions!” You’ve been kicked out of the emporium, and are banned from ever entering it again.

Knight of the Giant Queen

You have sworn allegiance to Serissa, the storm giant queen, and have joined her court at Maelstrom. The vow you have sworn to her supersedes all other oaths.

item.title: DDAL-DRWEP-02 - Wings of Death
item.content:encoded:
Wings of Death

Dreams of Red Wizards Epic for Tiers 3 and 4 Released on March 10, 2021

The treachery and master plan of Thay are at last revealed—and heroes are needed for a final assault to prevent the return of one of Faerûn’s greatest evils! Part Five of the Storm King’s Descent series of adventures.

item.title: DDAL-EB-14 - From Dust
item.description: Gisaul’s Spellbook (Libram of Souls and Flesh), Tentacle Rod, a spellbook, 3 legacy events, and 2 other items
item.content:encoded:
From Dust

Oracle of War Adventure for Tier 3 Released on March 8, 2021

Deep beneath Metrol, the Order of the Emerald Claw is excavating the ruins of a haunted daelkyr sanctuary. Sulring Mroranon knows a sage who can provide vital information about the dig site, but there’s a catch—they’ve not been seen for over a century. This is the first in a trilogy of adventures, the Engines of War storyline.

Items

  • Gisaul’s Spellbook (Libram of Souls and Flesh) Rare
  • Tentacle Rod Rare
  • 1 x Dust of Disappearance Uncommon
  • 1 x Elixir of Health Rare

Spellbooks

  • Gisaul’s Spellbook: mage armor, ray of sickness, blindness/deafness, ray of enfeeblement, web, bestow curse, vampiric touch, blight, dimension door, stoneskin, Bigby’s hand, and cloudkill

Legacy Events

Desperate Measures

Spinweave taught you how to temporarily release Valaara from Khyber by performing a ritual in the Creeping Nave. This could prove…useful?

Survivors of the Thorn Expedition

Some members of the Thorn Expedition are still alive. Check who survived below:

  • Gisaul Varren
  • Drago
Tavern Tale Spinner

You impressed the dwarves at the Stone Golem tavern with your tale-spinning prowess. At the end of this adventure, you can return to the Stone Golem to carouse with the dwarves.

RollResult
1–2You gain a hipflask of Frostmantle Fire, a string dwarven liquor. If you drink from this hipflask as an action, you are immune to fear for 1 hour. You can drink from the hipflask three times before it empties.
3–4The dwarves etch your tale into the walls of the tavern, immortalizing your legend in dwarf lore. You begin your next adventure with 2 hero points.
5–6One of the noble dwarves is so impressed with your tales that she commissions a bejeweled ivory statue of you or one of your companions (value 1,500 gp, but can only be sold at market for 500 gp).

item.title: DDEP10-01 - Terror in Ten-Towns
item.description: Bracers of Archery, Chardalyn Earring (Headband of Intellect), Charlatan’s Die, Pole of Angling, a potion, and a story award
item.content:encoded:
Terror in Ten-Towns

Season 10 Epic for Tier 1 Released on March 4, 2021

As a beastly army approaches Ten-Towns from the south, heroes take the lead in fortifications and defense. But can the heroes’ optimistic hard work overcome the worst enemy—the towns’ distrust of one another?

Items

  • Bracers of Archery Uncommon
  • Chardalyn Earring (Headband of Intellect) Uncommon
  • Charlatan’s Die Common
  • Pole of Angling Common
  • 1 x Potion of Healing Common

Story Awards

Defender of Easthaven

Alongside other skilled warriors, you successfully defended Easthaven, along with one of the other towns in the adventure.

item.title: DDAL10-05 - A Blight in the Darkness
item.description: Chardalyn Breastplate (Armor of Necrotic Resistance), Wand of Pyrotechnics, a potion, a scroll, and 3 story awards
item.content:encoded:
A Blight in the Darkness

Season 10 Adventure for Tier 2 Released on March 2, 2021

The wicked owlbear Frostclaw was nearly defeated. Now it’s time to finish the deed and destroy her and her master once and for all. But first, you must find them. Track them down and save Ten-Towns!

Part Five of the Plague of Ancients series.

Items

  • Chardalyn Breastplate (Armor of Necrotic Resistance) Rare
  • Wand of Pyrotechnics Common
  • 1 x Potion of Resistance (Acid) Uncommon
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Spider Climb Uncommon

Story Awards

Corrupted Chardalyn Infusion

Characters who fail their saving throw against the exploding chardalyn staff earn this story award.

Sing a Song of Vengeance

The characters earn this story award if they bring Feral-Tongue and Kaskur back to Wyrmdoom Crag alive.

The Song Falls Silent

The characters earn this story award if Kaskur dies during the adventure and isn’t returned to life.

item.title: DC-PoA-DCAF08 - The Big Ticket
item.description: Cloak of the Manta Ray, Wand of Pyrotechnics, and a potion
item.content:encoded:
The Big Ticket

Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 2 Released on March 1, 2021

Adventure Seed: Goat‑ball!

Targos mourns as the city’s star goat-ball player turns up dead. The Zhentarim need answers: was it incidental? Or is something even more nefarious than them pulling the strings?

Part Three of the Targos Ascending series.

Items

  • Cloak of the Manta Ray Uncommon
  • Wand of Pyrotechnics Common
  • 1 x Potion of Watchful Rest Common

item.title: DC-PoA-CODEX-01 - Bear the Lode
item.description: Boots of the Winterlands, Pole of Angling, and a potion
item.content:encoded:
Bear the Lode

Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 1 Released on February 27, 2021

Adventure Seed: Awake and Afraid

Putting an end to strange disturbances plaguing a mining operation is all in a day’s work for an adventurer, but is the job as straightforward as it seems, or is there more than meets the eye?

Items

  • Boots of the Winterlands Uncommon
  • Pole of Angling Common
  • 1 x Potion of Healing Common

item.title: DC-PoA-PM03 - Mindless Digging
item.content:encoded:
Mindless Digging

Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 1 Released on February 27, 2021

Shortly after the party steps foot into Termalaine they meet a Kobold who is frantically trying to find some help. They spot the party and ask the party to help his workers who uncovered something in a mine that is affecting the mind of the other kobolds.

item.title: CCC-BMG MOON9-1 - Dark Moon Rising
item.content:encoded:
Dark Moon Rising

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released by Baldman Games on February 22, 2021

A vitally important diplomat has gone missing, and a village seems to be troubled by an unseen force that threatens to spread all across the Moonshaes. All the while, a massive volcano rumbles in its slumber, threatening to awake, bringing forth chaos and destruction. A Dark Moon Rises over the island of Norland. Can you come to its aid?

Part One of the Dark Moon series.

item.title: CCC-BMG MOON9-2 - Dark Moon Marching
item.content:encoded:
Dark Moon Marching

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released by Baldman Games on February 22, 2021

Fighting factions in Rogarsheim increase the peril of the duergar and the threat from the Shadowfell. Can the characters uncover the darkness in Rogarsheim and unite the people against the threat from the Shadowfell?

Part Two of the Dark Moon series.

item.title: CCC-BMG MOON9-3 - Dark Moon Bound
item.content:encoded:
Dark Moon Bound

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released by Baldman Games on February 22, 2021

The characters need to recruit a cleric of Valkur to help them defeat the shadow army before the firbolg shaman and his minions rout the army of Norland with their spells of fear and terror. Will the characters persuade the cleric to assist them and return to the battlefield in time for Valkur to aid them all?

Part Three of the Dark Moon series.

item.title: DC-PoA-LEXI-01 - Don’t Wake Yeti
item.description: Illuminator’s Tattoo and a potion
item.content:encoded:
Don’t Wake Yeti

Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 2 Released on February 22, 2021

Adventure Seed: This Seems Familiar

You've seen better days for sure. First an avalanche. Then a whole lot of nothing. Then waking up hanging from the ceiling inside a cold, dark cavern. This is what happens when you find a stranger in the alps. Well, keep your wits about you, and you just might get out alive.

Items

  • Illuminator’s Tattoo Common
  • 1 x Potion of Healing Common

item.title: DC-PoA-CONMAR-03 - Unfrozen
item.description: Eversmoking Bottle, Smoldering Armor - Breastplate, and a potion
item.content:encoded:
Unfrozen

Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 1 Released on February 21, 2021

Adventure Seed: The Warmest Day

As Termalaine is getting warmer the agents of the Frostmaiden are looking for the reason, attacking anything in their path. The local Ten-Towners do not seem concerned, but maybe a Reghed tribe can help? It is time for adventurers to save the day. Again.

A part of the Oar’s Rest series.

Items

  • Eversmoking Bottle Uncommon
  • Smoldering Armor - Breastplate Common
  • 1 x Potion of Healing Common

item.title: DC-PoA-GSP01-02 - Crypt of the Mind Flayers
item.description: Lantern of Tracking (Aberrations), Psi Crystal, and a potion
item.content:encoded:
Crypt of the Mind Flayers

Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 1 Released by Greasy Snitches on February 21, 2021

Adventure Seed: In Too Deep

The crimson star has been found! A miner from Termalaine brought back a glowing red crystal that he discovered after a section of a nearby mine collapsed. A few days later, some townsfolk have gone mad and sightings of weird monsters have been reported. What is going on?!

Part Two of the Crimson Star series.

Items

  • Lantern of Tracking (Aberrations) Common
  • Psi Crystal Uncommon
  • 1 x Potion of Climbing Common

item.title: DC-PoA-KCB-02 - Big
item.description: Boots of the Winterlands, Pole of Angling, and a potion
item.content:encoded:
Big

Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 1 Released on February 21, 2021

Adventure Seed: Awake and Afraid

A shrunken goliath who needs an escort. Religious zealots on the run. A wizard in need of potion ingredients. A frost giant with a love of art and order. And an entrepreneurial druid. What happens to the party standing where all their interest intersect? A BIG adventure.

Items

  • Boots of the Winterlands Uncommon
  • Pole of Angling Common
  • 1 x Potion of Healing Common

item.title: DC-PoA-HARM-01-02 - Time Flies When You’re Delving Dungeons
item.content:encoded:
Time Flies When You’re Delving Dungeons

Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 1 Released on February 20, 2021

Tactics are tested as timelines shift and continuums converge in a dungeon where death is temporary and time itself is the enemy. Only the adventurers can capture the hands of time and steer the future away from certain doom.

Part Two of the Kobolds Through Time series.

item.title: DC-PoA-RB01 - The Chronographers Curse
item.description: Candle of the Deep, Circlet of Blasting, and a scroll
item.content:encoded:
The Chronographers Curse

Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 1 Released on February 18, 2021

Adventure Seed: Breaking Ice-olation

In the town of Easthaven, a group of adventurers is tasked on a routine mission to resupply an expedition to the Reghed Glacier. But everything is not quite as it seems, and it's not long before the chronographer's misfortunes become apparent.

Items

  • Candle of the Deep Common
  • Circlet of Blasting Uncommon
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Frost Fingers Common

item.title: DC-PoA-GSP03-02 - Lost in the Woods
item.description: Figurine of Wondrous Power (Silver Raven), Moon-Touched Shortsword, and a potion
item.content:encoded:
Lost in the Woods

Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 1 Released by Greasy Snitches on February 15, 2021

Adventure Seed: Do You Know the Way to Lonelywood?

The Frozen Eye has struck again, Their influence has grown from their cult at Easthaven, starting with a caravan from the town of Good Mead. What diabolical plan is up their sleeves? Will the adventurers be able to stop them?

Part Two of The Frozen Eye series.

Items

  • Figurine of Wondrous Power (Silver Raven) Uncommon
  • Moon-Touched Shortsword Common
  • 1 x Potion of Healing Common

item.title: DC-PoA-CTH01 - Roused by Raiders
item.description: Orb of Time and a scroll
item.content:encoded:
Roused by Raiders

Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 2 Released on February 12, 2021

Adventure Seed: Out of the Woods

A novice group of adventurers foolishly leads a remorhaz threat to the town of Lonelywood. The characters must protect the settlement from these monstrosities and discover why the adventurers were attacked in the first place.

Items

  • Orb of Time Common
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Pass Without a Trace Uncommon

item.title: DC-PoA-NN01-01 - Where Are Yew
item.description: Boots of False Tracks, Dust of Disappearance, and a potion
item.content:encoded:
Where Are Yew

Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 1 Released on February 12, 2021

Adventure Seed: Once Bitten, Ice Shy

Dougan's Hole is known to be the smallest and most insular member of the Ten Towns, a perfect target for petty thieves. However, recently crimes have been getting worse. Citizens have gone missing overnight. The townsfolk of Dougan's Hole are on high alert, travelers being their main suspect for the recent tragedies.

Part One of the Rise of Silverclaw series.

Items

  • Boots of False Tracks Common
  • Dust of Disappearance Uncommon
  • 1 x Potion of Climbing Common

item.title: DC-PoA-CBB-02 - Avarice Everlasting
item.description: Eversmoking Bottle, Smoldering Armor - Breastplate, and a potion
item.content:encoded:
Avarice Everlasting

Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 1 Released on February 11, 2021

Adventure Seed: The Warmest Day

A bright sphere of fire has appeared over the town of Termalaine. It showers the town in warmth and light as if it were the sun. The townsfolk celebrate what appears to a blessing from the gods. The truth is the false sun is a beacon conjured by an evil cursed artifact that has been awakened. Now hordes of undead pirates and bandits have seen this beacon and seek to claim the artifact for themselves.

Items

  • Eversmoking Bottle Uncommon
  • Smoldering Armor - Breastplate Common
  • 1 x Potion of Healing Common

item.title: DDAL10-06 - The Fallen Star
item.description: Chime of Opening, Prosthetic Limb, 2 potions, a story award, and one other item
item.content:encoded:
The Fallen Star

Season 10 Adventure for Tier 2 Released on February 11, 2021

As the last vestiges of Feral-Tongue’s legacy echo across Icewind Dale, an ominous sign makes itself known. A falling star far to the west heralds a new unknown. A goliath hunting party returns to Wyrmdoom Crag, speaking of a strange creature. Perhaps it may be the key to discovering the source of the mysterious light.

Part Six of the Plague of Ancients series.

Items

  • Chime of Opening Rare
  • Prosthetic Limb Common
  • 1 x Charm of the Ice Troll Unique
  • 1 x Potion of Climbing Common
  • 1 x Potion of Greater Healing Uncommon

Story Awards

Captured Goliaths

Nararhak Tree-Eye and some of the goliath hunters you encountered were captured by spiderlike creatures Lieutenant Prook calls “neogi.”

item.title: DC-PoA-LEGIT-CIPH-01 - A Bump in the Night
item.description: Bracers of Archery, Dread Help, and a potion
item.content:encoded:
A Bump in the Night

Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 1 Released on February 7, 2021

Adventure Seed: Burrowing Borrowers

The townsfolk of Easthaven are plagued by strange sounds coming from their basements in the middle of the night, only to wake up to find their items missing in the morning. What dark forces lie at the heart of this disturbance?

Items

  • Bracers of Archery Uncommon
  • Dread Help Common
  • 1 x Potion of Healing Common

item.title: DC-PoA-PM01 - Adventures in Babysitting Squids
item.description: Chest of Preserving and a scroll
item.content:encoded:
Adventures in Babysitting Squids

Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 2 Released on February 6, 2021

Adventure Seed: The Littlest Squidling

While traveling in the cold lands of Icewind Dale, the adventurers see a strange flying ship being chased by dragons that damage part of the ship. When the party goes to investigate the parts of the ship that droped they are presented with an unexpected new friend A Squidling.

Items

  • Chest of Preserving Common
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Mind Spike Uncommon

item.title: DC-PoA-ZF-01 - Undisclosed Ordeals
item.description: Alchemy Jug, Cloak of Many Fashions, and a scroll
item.content:encoded:
Undisclosed Ordeals

Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 1 Released on February 3, 2021

Adventure Seed: A Dark Horse

With the Frostmaiden’s grasp over Icewind Dale crushing spirits and snuffing out hope, the frozen north is a dismal place. No one has answers, and no one can say for sure when Auril’s curse will be lifted, so it’s only to be expected that political devilment seems to have thrived in these times. When a wealthy merchant in Bryn Shander requests help on behalf of a friend, who knows what long hidden secrets they’ll uncover along the way.

Items

  • Alchemy Jug Uncommon
  • Cloak of Many Fashions Common
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Alter Self Uncommon

item.title: DC-PoA-DCAF07 - I’m In Your Arms
item.description: Cast-Off Armor (Breastplate), Guardian Emblem, and a scroll
item.content:encoded:
I’m In Your Arms

Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 2 Released on February 2, 2021

Adventure Seed: Holy Auril, Mother of Cod

The barkeep at The Luskan Arms runs into a lost love–but the authorities have selected her as the sacrifice! Will the adventurers find a way to spare her? Will love endure the frost or fall victim to the rime?

Part Two of the Targos Ascending series.

Items

  • Cast-Off Armor (Breastplate) Common
  • Guardian Emblem Uncommon
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Detect Evil and Good Common

item.title: DC-PoA-NBDD-01 - Ice, Ice, Birdie
item.description: Charlatan’s Die, Brooch of Shielding, and a scroll
item.content:encoded:
Ice, Ice, Birdie

Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 2 Released on January 31, 2021

Adventure Seed: Winter Over

In Bryn Shander, the city prepares for a day of celebration and festivities, as a well-known couple finally ties the knot. Adventurers are needed to help ensure all goes well, especially with the appearance of a famed troupe of kenku bards. Can you protect the troupe, save the wedding, and help the happy couple survive the cruel, cold world that is Icewind Dale under Auril's eternal winter?

Items

  • Charlatan’s Die Common
  • Brooch of Shielding Uncommon
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Ceremony Common

item.title: DC-PoA-GSP02-01H - The Arrival of Mr. Sorrow
item.description: Cloak of Many Fashions and a scroll
item.content:encoded:
The Arrival of Mr. Sorrow

Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 1 Released by Greasy Snitches on January 29, 2021

Adventure Seed: A Dark Horse

The town of Good Mead is about to select its new town speaker after the last one was killed by a giant. However, an eladrin has joined the election at the last minute, promising that he and his men know how to stop the Everlasting Rime.

Part One of the Factions Reawakened (Harpers) series.

Items

  • Cloak of Many Fashions Common
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Alter Self Uncommon

item.title: DC-PoA-GSP02-02H - The Priest of Caer-Dineval
item.description: Smoldering Armor (Studded Leather) and a scroll
item.content:encoded:
The Priest of Caer-Dineval

Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 1 Released by Greasy Snitches on January 29, 2021

Adventure Seed: The Muttering Gnome

A gnome priest of Lathander wearing tattered vestment and broken manacles has been found in Caer-Dineval. The priest, who is a member of the Order of the Gauntlet, seems unaffected by the cold. What’s more fascinating is that it looks like it has seen something it shouldn’t. Now, what would that be?

Part Two of the Factions Reawakened (Harpers) series.

Items

  • Smoldering Armor (Studded Leather) Common
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Bless Common

item.title: DC-PoA-GSP02-03H - That Ain’t Mead
item.description: Moon-Touched Shortsword and a potion
item.content:encoded:
That Ain’t Mead

Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 1 Released by Greasy Snitches on January 29, 2021

Adventure Seed: Do You Know the Way to Lonelywood?

A caravan transporting mead to Easthaven has gone missing. The Zhentarim merchants who have placed the order were very demanding in retrieving their mead and willing to pay more just to get it all back. Sounds pretty suspicious.

Part Three of the Factions Reawakened (Harpers) series.

Items

  • Moon-Touched Shortsword Common
  • 1 x Potion of Healing Common

item.title: DC-PoA-GSP02-04H - The Horror Sphere
item.description: Masquerade Tattoo and one other item
item.content:encoded:
The Horror Sphere

Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 1 Released by Greasy Snitches on January 29, 2021

Adventure Seed: I’d Like to Make a Return, Please

A black pearl the size of a human head has been discovered by adventurers and has been brought to Lonelywood. However, whoever has the pearl immediately dies as soon as they see a goat. Somebody needs to put it back where it was found! But what does the Lords' Alliance have to do with all of this?

Part Four of the Factions Reawakened (Harpers) series.

Items

  • Masquerade Tattoo Common
  • 1 x Walloping Ammunition (Arrow) Common

item.title: DC-PoA-LEGIT-SV-02 - The Shape of Silence
item.description: Ring of Jumping, Smoldering Armor (Studded Leather), and a scroll
item.content:encoded:
The Shape of Silence

Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 1 Released on January 29, 2021

Adventure Seed: The Muttering Gnome

The fortress prison of Revel's End is a panopticon where guards watch the every movement of every prisoner. So how did one of their prisoners end up all the way in Targos? …and what else has slipped from their gaze?

Items

  • Ring of Jumping Uncommon
  • Smoldering Armor (Studded Leather) Common
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Bless Common

item.title: DC-PoA-KCB-01 - The Lady of the Maer
item.content:encoded:
The Lady of the Maer

Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 1 Released on January 28, 2021

A luxury steamship lake cruiser disappeared when Auril’s Rime began. Its fate remains a total mystery. Now an artifact from the ship has been found on an iceberg in the middle of Maer Dualdon. The party is tasked with researching this new finding in hopes of discovering the fate of the ship.

item.title: CCC-GHC-BK3-01 - Assassination in Oeble
item.content:encoded:
Assassination in Oeble

Convention Created Content for Tier 1 Released by Gamehole Publishing on January 25, 2021

The scion of The Drakefang has disappeared! Rumors of assassination quickly sweep over the lands of The Swordpoint Streams. Lady Mezmra Irondrake calls to adventurers to discover her daughter’s fate and bring her home, dead-or-alive! Can they find answers in a violence-ridden town or uncover a truth better kept underground?

item.title: CCC-GHC-BK3-02 - The Girl with the Wet Nose
item.content:encoded:
The Girl with the Wet Nose

Convention Created Content for Tier 1 Released by Gamehole Publishing on January 25, 2021

Some evils never die. Only the fuzziest heroes have enough lives to end the threat.

item.title: CCC-GHC-BK3-03 - Secrets in Storage
item.content:encoded:
Secrets in Storage

Convention Created Content for Tier 1 Released by Gamehole Publishing on January 25, 2021

Every year, the town of Sorndorn auctions off the contents of storage vaults belonging to anonymous owners who have defaulted on their rent. Among this year’s auction is one vault that may hold crucial information regarding the latest threat to the Border Kingdoms, attracting those who wish to obtain this information to further their own agendas. Only the keenest of eyes and shrewdest of skills will be able to discern the valuables from the pile of rubbish.

item.title: CCC-GHC-BK3-04 - A Mural of Arthyn
item.content:encoded:
A Mural of Arthyn

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released by Gamehole Publishing on January 25, 2021

The artist Diego Orozco has painted a mural in the town square of Arthyn. Yesterday, a small child threw a rock at the mural. Today, a boulder falls from the sea cliffs, smashing the shipyard! Sensing an opportunity, the townsfolk gather to debate how best to use this magical mural–if at all. But without a leader to guide them, the town’s debate will quickly turn into chaos.

item.title: CCC-GHC-BK3-05 - Duskwood Wild Magic Pools
item.content:encoded:
Duskwood Wild Magic Pools

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released by Gamehole Publishing on January 25, 2021

The wild magic pools of the Duskwood are the stuff of legends but these pools lie deep in the heart of the magical forest. Few adventurers travel there and even fewer return.

item.title: CCC-GHC-BK3-06 - Sour in Splondar
item.content:encoded:
Sour in Splondar

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released by Gamehole Publishing on January 25, 2021

The Splondarren Harvest Festival is about to begin, and the cream of the Border Kingdoms nobility will be on hand to taste the region’s finest ales. But a mysterious illness strikes the festgoers and threatens the lives of even the well-guarded nobles. Can the adventurers discover the source of the affliction in time?

item.title: CCC-GHC-BK3-07 - Once Stolen, Twice Deceived
item.content:encoded:
Once Stolen, Twice Deceived

Convention Created Content for Tier 3 Released by Gamehole Publishing on January 25, 2021

Rumors of sightings of the undead Lord High Mages of Adaerglast outside of their castle prison are spreading across the Border Kingdoms, striking fear among the common people and worry among the greatest wizards of the Realms. While attending a nearby celebration, the characters are tasked with apprehending the liches and sealing them away once more.

item.title: CCC-GHC-BK3-08 - The Archmage’s New Robes
item.content:encoded:
The Archmage’s New Robes

Convention Created Content for Tier 3 Released by Gamehole Publishing on January 25, 2021

You have been called to the aid of the Mage Rymdyl before, but never to act as her escort to the famed Fashion Week in Blackalblade. Time to put on your finest clothes and prepare for the dangers of high fashion in the back alleys of the Border Kingdom’s cutting edge of fashion.

item.title: CCC-GHC-BK3-09 - A Convergence of Gods
item.description: Tome of the Stilled Tongue, a potion, and 2 other items
item.content:encoded:
A Convergence of Gods

Convention Created Content for Tier 4 Released by Gamehole Publishing on January 25, 2021

The area known as Godswalk Keep has been showing signs of activity. Are the Bloodreavers really working towards bringing back Garagos and restoring him to divine status? Only true heroes of the Border Kingdoms can stop them.

Items

  • Tome of the Stilled Tongue Legendary
  • 1 x Elixir of Health Rare
  • 1 x Potion of Heroism Rare
  • 1 x Oil of Sharpness Very Rare

item.title: DDAL-DRW-07 - Moment of Peace
item.description: Dancing Longsword, Stonespeaker Crystal, 2 scrolls, a legacy event, and one other item
item.content:encoded:
Moment of Peace

Dreams of Red Wizards Adventure for Tier 3 Released on January 25, 2021

Armed with a ritual that will let them track the Wyrmskull Throne, the characters travel to distant mountain, magical desert, and the Outer Planes—but all their success might yet be undone by a vengeful enemy. Part Four of the Storm King’s Descent series of adventures.

Items

  • Dancing Longsword Very Rare
  • Stonespeaker Crystal Rare
  • 1 x Elixir of Health Rare
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Passwall Rare
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of True Seeing Very Rare

Legacy Events

Oathbreaker

Whether by choice or by circumstance, you have failed to fulfill your promise to V’zree of reaching out to the soul of the drow arcanist X’althoa, then gloating about how V’zree shared the secret of the soultheft spell. But with V’zree trapped in Carceri, surely there will be no consequences.

item.title: DDAL10-04 - Cold Benevolence
item.description: Robe of Useful Items, a potion, and 3 story awards
item.content:encoded:
Cold Benevolence

Season 10 Adventure for Tier 1 Released on January 25, 2021

Feral-Tongue must be stopped! But without aid, it’s likely that your efforts will be in vain. Among rising tensions, Old Goat suggests an unlikely ally: Chwingas! Her plan, however, isn’t popular among other members of the clan. Can you sway their opinion? Better still, can you find the elusive elemental spirits?

Part Four of the Plague of Ancients series.

Items

  • Robe of Useful Items Uncommon
  • 1 x Potion of Resistance (Cold) Uncommon

Story Awards

Charm of Lor the Timid

The characters earn this story award if they successfully persuade Lor the Timid to aid them.

Charm of Sappa Everwatching

The characters earn this story award if they successfully persuade Sappa Ever-Watching to aid them.

Charm of Singing Gir

The characters earn this story award if they successfully persuade Singing Gir to aid them.

item.title: DDAL-EB-13 - Stonefire
item.description: Elemntal Airship, Mace of Disruption, Ring of Evasion, Shield, +3, and 4 legacy events
item.content:encoded:
Stonefire

Oracle of War Adventure for Tier 3 Released on January 24, 2021

The light of the Silver Flame shields all who bathe in its glory, but also casts deep shadows. When heretics in the fortress city of Flamekeep emerge from the dark, the Cathedral of the Silver Flame becomes the last bastion in a citywide conflict. This is the third in a trilogy of adventures, the Drums of War storyline.

Items

  • Elemntal Airship Unique
  • Mace of Disruption Rare
  • Ring of Evasion Rare
  • Shield, +3 Very Rare

Legacy Events

Battlefield Medic

You helped Keeper Jaela Daran tend to the wounded. Later in the campaign, you may discover the consequences of this action.

Divine Vigilance

You persuaded the Keeper of the Flame to begin peace talks with Breland to unite against the threat posed by the Lord of Blades.

Traitor Sphinx

Flamewind survived her failed ambush and fled into Sharn. You haven’t seen the last of her, for sure.

Trust No One

You helped Lukas Varko escaped the Cathedral of the Flame. Perhaps you’ll see him again in the future…

item.title: DC-PoA-DCAF04 - A Macabre Nightal
item.description: Figurine of Wondrous Power (Silver Raven), Moon-Touched Shortsword, and a potion
item.content:encoded:
A Macabre Nightal

Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 1 Released on January 18, 2021

Adventure Seed: Do You Know the Way to Lonelywood?

A young elf woman returns to Lonelywood, the scene of her family’s murder. But necromancy is in the air as the undead walk the roads. Can the adventurers rescue her and help her find closure?

A part of the Diversions of Comedy and Frost series.

Items

  • Figurine of Wondrous Power (Silver Raven) Uncommon
  • Moon-Touched Shortsword Common
  • 1 x Potion of Healing Common

item.title: DC-PoA-ROG-01 - The Frozen Path to Easthaven
item.description: Mithral Armor (Scale), a scroll, and one other item
item.content:encoded:
The Frozen Path to Easthaven

Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 2 Released on January 17, 2021

Adventure Seed: Caravanning!

Brave The Frozen Path!

The party is hired as bodyguards to guard a caravan from The Spine of The World to Easthaven. Besides the frigid elements, what other horrors await the adventurers?

Items

  • Mithral Armor (Scale) Uncommon
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Magic Missile Common
  • 1 x Walloping Ammunition (Sling Bullet) Common

item.title: DC-PoA-DCAF06 - A Front On Frost
item.description: Efficient Quiver, Orb of Time, and a scroll
item.content:encoded:
A Front On Frost

Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 2 Released on January 10, 2021

Adventure Seed: Out of the Woods

Leaders of the Ten-Towns have lost their patience with the antics of the Zhentarim in Targos. But giants have begun interfering in their leader’s plans. Can the adventurers find a solution?

Part One of the Targos Ascending series.

Items

  • Efficient Quiver Uncommon
  • Orb of Time Common
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Pass Without a Trace Uncommon

item.title: DC-PoA-INGH-01 - A Hot Time in the Cold Town Tonight
item.description: Eversmoking Bottle, Smoldering Armor - Breastplate, and a potion
item.content:encoded:
A Hot Time in the Cold Town Tonight

Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 1 Released on January 9, 2021

Adventure Seed: The Warmest Day

The town of Termalaine is experiencing a strangely warm day, with the temperature almost up to freezing, and its rivals want to know why. What secrets are behind this spell of mild weather?

Items

  • Eversmoking Bottle Uncommon
  • Smoldering Armor - Breastplate Common
  • 1 x Potion of Healing Common

item.title: DC-PoA-CONMAR-01 - Something Sinister
item.content:encoded:
Something Sinister

Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 1 Released on January 7, 2021

A group of kobold miners have uncovered something very unusual at the bottom of their mine. They need a band of brave adventurers to make sure that what they have found is not a risk to their health. Are you brave enough to heed the call?

A part of the Oar’s Rest series.

item.title: DDAL-EB-12 - The Waiting Game
item.description: Ring of Regeneration, a potion, and a legacy event
item.content:encoded:
The Waiting Game

Oracle of War Adventure for Tier 3 Released on January 4, 2021

Narcy of Xandrar offers safe haven in the towers of Arcanix, but even she can’t foresee the coming storm. Across the centuries, dead hands move their puppets in a grand conspiracy to control the Draconic Prophecy. They predicted the Oracle of War’s creation, and now their agents lie in wait for the day they can seize it for themselves. That day is today. This is the second in a trilogy of adventures, the Drums of War storyline.

Items

  • Ring of Regeneration Very Rare
  • 1 x Potion of Superior Healing Rare

Legacy Events

Heroic Failure

You failed to stop Immeral’s plan before at least one of the floating towers were crashed into Arcanix:

  • For each tower that fell (to the maximum of 3), you MUST refuse the next hero point earned during a future adventure. When you’ve refused hero points equal to the number of fortresses that crashed, remove this legacy event from your character.

item.title: CCC-GSP03-01 - Heartfelt Memories
item.content:encoded:
Heartfelt Memories

Convention Created Content for Tier 1 Released by Greasy Snitches on January 3, 2021

Lily asks for help to bring her mother to her final resting place, but the fey have other interests. Is believing in memories enough?

item.title: DC-PoA-CBB-01 - Twirling Towards Oblivion
item.description: Alchemy Jug, Cloak of Many Fashions, and a scroll
item.content:encoded:
Twirling Towards Oblivion

Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 1 Released on January 3, 2021

Adventure Seed: A Dark Horse

The town of Good Mead is going to elect a new town speaker. The two candidates are both well respected merchants and each other's business rivals. Chaos ensues when Mr. Simplesun, an eccentric old man known for telling tall tales, throws his hat into the race. He is claiming to know the horrible and disturbing truth about the two front-runners!

Items

  • Alchemy Jug Uncommon
  • Cloak of Many Fashions Common
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Alter Self Uncommon

item.title: DC-PoA-HARM-01-01 - First Time for Everything
item.content:encoded:
First Time for Everything

Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 1 Released on January 1, 2021

Amidst Auril’s eternal darkness and growing unrest in the Ten Towns, adventurers delve into the frozen earth in pursuit of small-time thieves. But what started as a simple retrieval mission quickly escalates, as unexpected magic thwarts their pursuit. As shadows of the past coalesce and present threats leap into the looming future, adventurers fight against the ravages of time itself to catch yesterday’s culprits and thwart tomorrow’s villains.

Part One of the Kobolds Through Time series.

item.title: DC-PoA-DUCKS-OS-02 - Are You Open-Minded?
item.description: Dread Help and a potion
item.content:encoded:
Are You Open-Minded?

Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 1 Released on December 31, 2020

Adventure Seed: Burrowing Borrowers

Crime has increased in the town of Easthaven, a group of kobolds who are normally docile are now stealing from the defenseless civilians.

Items

  • Dread Help Common
  • 1 x Potion of Healing Common

item.title: DC-PoA-SFG01 - Tomb of the Banished Thane
item.description: Candle of the Deep, Circlet of Blasting, and a scroll
item.content:encoded:
Tomb of the Banished Thane

Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 1 Released on December 31, 2020

Adventure Seed: Breaking Ice-olation

A recent avalanche in the Spine of the World has revealed a mountainside entrance of worked stone. Halena Ironstone believes it could be the tomb of her ancestor, Daglund the Banished, and she needs brave adventurers to investigate.

Items

  • Candle of the Deep Common
  • Circlet of Blasting Uncommon
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Frost Fingers Common

item.title: CCC-MAYDAYS-02-01 - King Obould’s Fist
item.content:encoded:
King Obould’s Fist

Convention Created Content for Tier 3 Released on December 29, 2020

A figure from legend asks the gathered heroes to help set the cosmos aright. Will the heroes overcome the multiversal threat? Will they overcome their own biases?

item.title: CCC-RPSG-04 - The Waystop
item.content:encoded:
The Waystop

Convention Created Content for Tier 1 Released on December 29, 2020

A relentless torrential storm has forced you to seek shelter at an abandoned caravan lodge with several others you met on the road, but the dangers outside may pale in comparison to the dangers within. Can you survive the night?

item.title: CCC-RPSG-05 - Through the Ashes and Flames
item.content:encoded:
Through the Ashes and Flames

Convention Created Content for Tier 1 Released on December 29, 2020

A relentless heat wave has left the Flooded Forest parched, and the Fireseeker Task Force is scrambling to contain fires that have blazed to inexplicable life. Can you discover what burns at the heart of this mystery before all that is left are ashes?

item.title: CCC-RPSG-06 - Of Caravans and Crossings
item.content:encoded:
Of Caravans and Crossings

Convention Created Content for Tier 1 Released on December 29, 2020

A wealthy merchant’s child has been abducted by brigands, and courageous adventurers are needed to mount a daring rescue. Will you succeed?

item.title: CCC-RPSG-07 - In Good Company
item.content:encoded:
In Good Company

Convention Created Content for Tier 1 Released on December 29, 2020

Come, come, all ye daring adventurers—the Young Wolves have a job for you!

It’s simple: travel alongside a caravan through the Cormanthor Forest, and escort a sick noblewoman home to her loving family. The job pays handsomely for a week’s work.

What could possibly go wrong?

item.title: CCC-SAC-06 - So, You Get Frogs
item.content:encoded:
So, You Get Frogs

Convention Created Content for Tier 1 Released on December 29, 2020

You are certain you went to sleep somewhere quite different, but find yourself awakened in a dismal swamp, on the porch of an empty shack. What forces have drawn you here, and what challenges will you need to survive to get back home?
